title: What are the millennial things? - Quora

response.answer_text: Millennial was also known as “eco boomer.” Much babies were born during these period. It is sometimes 1990 and 2000. Now it is Generation Z. Actually the millennial things is destroying our planet. Greed had surfaced and we robbed the planet, putting the future generation in deep debts. The next Gen Z will have to correct. I feel sorry and say sorry to all the readers. Please forgive us. We have now put a lot of burden to the younger generation of today. Peace and love
